attributes.action: encourage freedom of movement by drastically reducing fuel taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The tax element of the pump price of petrol is more than 80% and it is even worse for diesel.
This is impinging on people's freedom of movement and the movement of goods

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
